```{r}
#loaded packages 
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

instacart_data = read_csv("./data/instacart_train_data.csv.zip") %>%
  clean_names()
```


```{r}
instacart_data %>% 
  filter(department == "personal care" & order_dow == 6) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~order_hour_of_day, type = "histogram", color = "red") %>% 
  layout(yaxis = list(title = "count"))
```
